list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a spherical green seed that is eaten as a vegetable or as a pulse when dried.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: pasta with peas, leeks, and watercress
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Pasta với đậu Hà Lan, tỏi tây và cải xoong

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the hardy Eurasian climbing plant which yields pods containing peas.
used in names of plants or seeds that are similar or related to the pea, e.g. chickpea, sweet pea.
